name: server-side-slinger
description: This is a sample template for sam-app - Below is a brief explanation of what we have generated for you:

scripts.local-dynamo: docker run -v "$PWD":/dynamodb_local_db -p 8000:8000 --network sam-demo --name dynamodb -h dynamodb cnadiminti/dynamodb-local
scripts.sam-package: sam package --profile personal --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket dashmobile-deploy
scripts.sam-deploy: sam deploy --profile personal --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name ServerSideScraper --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy: npm run sam-validate && npm run sam-package && npm run sam-deploy
scripts.tdd: cd chrome-test && npm run tdd && cd ../
